website_summaries.verdict: This pad stays in place on your bar thanks to a hook-and-loop closure – a feature which many other pads lack.
pros: Designed to fit 2-inch Olympic size bars perfectly
Made of top-grade 3/4-inch dense foam for optimal support
Won't absorb moisture – stays on surface for wiping
cons: May not fit larger bars well

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of padding and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I built my very own power rack for use in my basement and already had a bar and weight stack to use in conjunction with it. I was looking for a thicker option for a barbell pad as most of the ones I have encountered tend to allow the bar to dig into my neck area when loaded with heavier weights. This is a great way to prevent that from happening and I couldn't be happier with the purchase. The material quality is fantastic and I would imagine that it won't wear for quite some time. It holds snug to the bar and the stitching on the velcro has held well up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped up in the Darkness....
customer_reviews.text: The Dark Fitness Pad is a crowning achievement. The comfort and thick padding make a huge difference for Hip Thrusts, front squats, squats that they are kind of enjoyable. Lol, call me a sadist but you know what they say if you are enjoying your work out you are most likely doing it wrong. Anyway here are some shots of the pad, and belt that I might add match my Titan Fitness power rack and gear perfectly. I have also ordered the leather wrist wraps, straps and knee support sleeves. Their product are top notch! The weight belt is made of Buffalo hide so it is really soft and strong, over all a sweet set-up. Thank you Dark Iron Fitness
customer_reviews.author: Doggie D.

customer_reviews.title: Not thick enough for heavy glute thrusts
customer_reviews.text: The size and amount of padding are good for barbell squats and lunges. The one inch "thin" padding is good for those exercises. I haven't done more than about 250 on the squats but it was still comfortable at that weight. However, glute thrusts start to get painful at only 200 pounds or so, and very painful around 300. The pain is enough to ruin the set. Many women lift more than 200 pounds and men more than 400. The Glute Guy recommends these pads for Glute Thusts, in his "Protecting Your Hips": Airex Pad -- our gym uses this for the Nautilus Glute Drive Squat Sponge Hampton Thick Bar Pad I don't recommend this Dark Iron pad.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Recieved the wrong pad, but product seems good
customer_reviews.text: Kind of peeved because I ordered the "shut up and squat" pad and recieved a plain black pad instead. Returned it and stated the reason for return was that I received the wrong pad. I was immediately shipped the "correct" pad, but yet again...received a plain black one. Looks like I dont get a chance to return it a second time...so just be prepared that you'll probably get the wrong pad. Otherwise, seems to be good quality, love that its synthetic leather and not actually animal skin (bonus points for that!) 4 stars for durability, comfort and sturdiness due to the fact that I haven't gotten to use it much yet since I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, non slip, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "Shut up & Squat" pad. I love it. I bought this compared to other brands because the exterior is easy to wipe down/disinfect especially after sweating. Compared to other ones which are foamy/absorbable. Seems very sturdy,and it doesn't slide or roll around the bar at all! Only thing is, I wish it was just a tad softer. It's a bit too hard/stiff in my opinion, so it's not the most comfortable for me. Hopefully after sometime, it breaks in a little bit. But I'm glad I bought, it seems to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: SA952

customer_reviews.title: Squat heavy? Dont use pads because of EGO?
customer_reviews.text: Hey I am one of those tough guys who never used these and laughed at people who did... Well i changed that because i started to get bruises on my traps and back after heavy squats. Used this on squats yesterday with 275lbs. on my back. I felt no pain of the bar on my traps that I normally do. I was able to focus on my glutes rather than my traps lol!
customer_reviews.author: JP Petry

customer_reviews.title: Protect your traps in style!
customer_reviews.text: Dark Iron Fitness ROCKS at making awesome products!! This barbell pad is amazing for many reasons: 1) Instead of neioprene or foam, the cover is made of leather, which feels a lot more comfortable on the skin; 2) It is extra wide, which protects your entire shoulders from contact with the barbell; 3) It is thick and the foam is high quality; 4) It has a great asthetic; 5) It helps me squat twice as much weight as normal. Okay, that last one was a lie. But don’t let that detract from the rest of the honest and valid points I have made in this review.
customer_reviews.author: JohnyVegas82

customer_reviews.title: Increase your lift!! Perfect for skinny guys!! How?
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for squats. Especially for a skinny guy like me. Did it give me more strength? Did it improve my form? Does it get looks? NO! It just does what it should, pads your bar where it rests on your back and that alone will urge you to load more weight on it as it is. Looks and feels durable and will fit in a basic gym bag. It’s a strong leather material, perhaps a vinyl but it feels and stays clean. Along with a lifting belt, shoes and support gear for heavy lifting this is eventually a must.
customer_reviews.author: Flaca

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be very good. I have other products from Dark Iron and all have been very good quality. I low bar squat and get very sore were the bar contact in the pocket of my shoulders. This squat pad works great. Not too thick as to drastically change bar position. Provides just enough padding for comfort but still giving some feel of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome barbell pad!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start... This item came in on time which was fantastic! The quality is top notch, very well made, and easy to keep clean. I like to squat and hip thrust heavy and this pad provides the perfect amount of support and comfort. I don’t feel like the bar is digging into my shoulders or hips. Overall I’m very impressed with Dark Iron fitness products and I look forward to growing my collection! I would highly recommend the barbell neck pad and all of Dark Irons products whether you own a gym and want quality accessories or for your own personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell pad, great company.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great barbell pad! I don't actually use these very often because I'm used to the weight of the bar on my shoulders, but I've recently started doing some heavy squat jumps and don't love the feeling of metal knurling slamming into my neck. This barbell pad is much better than most that I've tried - usually they're either too soft and don't do anything, or too thick and they mess up my technique. This barbell pad finds a great balance and also feels like it'll last a long time. The company that makes these are super responsive and very helpful and also offer a lifetime warranty on all their products!
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Well made, doesn't move around during use.
customer_reviews.text: This neckpad is comfortable and well made. I bought another that was foam without a vinyl cover. That one was too thick and seemed like it would rip easily, plus didn't hold steady for lunges. The Dark Iron product checks all my boxes and doesn't move around on the bar while I do lunges. The nylon type fabrics can be a little abrasive on your neck, but the Dark Knight feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: leo v

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an alternative but the ProFitness Barbell Squat Pad is a much better pad. The Dark Iron will slip on the bar, but not much. With the ProFitness, it comes with velcro straps to hold the pad in place. SO you won't have to worry about it slipping will your exercising. I highly recommend the ProFitness Barbell over Dark Iron.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Rochester

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this pad for back squats and hip thrusters. I like the firmness of the pad. It feels like it will last along time. It slides nicely onto the barbell and the velcro connection is easy and quick. I wish they had offered an option without a corny saying, AS that caused me a few moments of pause before buying, but that does not detract from the value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product for squats
customer_reviews.text: I have used plenty of ratty pads at different gyms, and finally decided to buy my own. I love all my Dark Iron products, and appreciate their warranty. This pad looks great, feels great, and wraps over the bar for added security (Not like those others that have the Velcro on the edges). If you are looking to lift heavy, definitely get yourself this pad, and check out their lifting belt too! Every product they make is high quality and a fair price.. also, I bought some weight clamps from Dark Iron, and they are far superior to the others I bought for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness this is so awesome! I have been getting into squats and hip ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this is so awesome! I have been getting into squats and hip thrusts more and was looking for a decent barbell pad online. This came highly recommended so I thought, why not? This is actually a really great hip thrust pad for the price. I didn't get one single bruise while using it (and trust me, everything bruises me if I'm not careful). I can easy do heavy hip thrusts with this pad as well as weighed squats. Get it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linh N

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion but slips
customer_reviews.text: I am probably 60-70% ok with this. it is thick enough not to leave barbell marks on your skin, but the leather like material slips when sweaty, so I have to put a towel. if you are ok with that, then go ahead. I would rather have it, than not to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Seems stiff/hard, but is actually perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have other Dark Iron fitness products that I've been really happy with, and this one is no different. Out of the box I found it to be really HARD for a pad. I thought to myself, "I don't know how comfortable this is actually going to be." To my surprise, once I threw it on the bar with my usual weight plates, it just basically molded to my shoulders. The stiffness is perfect, and reassures me that this will last longer than my last barbell pad. Thanks again Dark Iron fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Braxar

customer_reviews.title: Quite hard but decent product, durable
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the iron bull which has the indent for the neck and felt that wasn’t helping as the pressure was still on my neck during squats. I bought this and find it extremely hard which basically means I have the same issue just not as bad, I still use a towel behind my neck to reduce the pressure so I can squat heavier weights without pain
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Not the best design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for pelvic lifts and squats. There is a 1/4" gap when placed over an Olympic bar. You have to index the pad every time you use it. If you use it for pelvic trust lifts the pad rotates and the bar pushes through the gap in the pad. Besides this it is a great pad. Very wide and the padding is dense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my at home smith machine. I’ve had it a couple weeks and use specifically for squats and calf raises. The padding is good and thick enough to sustain comfort under as much as 355lbs. so far. I believe it would do fine under more weight. My shoulders didn’t feel any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Estein

customer_reviews.title: Alright but not for heavier weights or hip thrusts
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and while I don't use this everyday, quality is alright. Should also be easy to clean. However, if you're planning to use these on heavier weights, its padding is not very thick, so it's not going to be great for hip thrusts. It's just not thick enough to cushion the barbell. The velcro also has potential to damage your pants, so use a towel or something as buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good product that can always be improved.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product n no regrets on buying it. But I think it still can be designed alil better. Velcro needs to over lap the gap alil more. As the bar tends to sink into the gap n then u start feeling the bar. Could be fixed with more velcro to close the gap alil more around the bar. N maybe this is user error. But never squat shirtless. Sweat makes it slippery n then the struggle of keeping the bar safely on ur neck begins. But like I said I'll take the blame for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Barbell Neck Pad I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I have purchased from Dark Iron Fitness and I am very impressed. I bought it based upon my high satisfaction with the barbell clamps I had bought a while back from Dark Iron. I purchased this pad to replace the Harbinger model I had been using. The Harbinger never fit my Olympic bar snugly and would slide left and right and revolve around the bar, which was distracting while doing squats. The Dark Iron product fits snugly, has thicker padding, and just looks like it has a superior build quality. Of all the neck pads I have used in gyms and at home, this is the clear winner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Thick, comfy pad for a 5-6 day a week chick lifter
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I can never find a good pad at the gym so instead of hunting down a sweaty, smelly, thin, squished up pad 2 days a week, I ordered this 'drop it like a squat' pad for my time, hygiene and sanity. I've used it twice since receiving it last week and it's worked great for back squats. It velcroed nicely and stood in place as long as I kept proper form and provided much needed comfort on my traps and shoulders. I'm able to add more weight and not feel like my spine is being completely compressed. Glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: carli

customer_reviews.title: Get it and Get BIG...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I got the pink one because my wife liked it. I squat with a pink and black bar pad because it is a great product. 3 plates for 315 feels as comfortable as just a bar. Wide enough that even the widest shoulders dont have a pad edge cutting into them. Would definitely get this pad again, just maybe not the pink chick design option...
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Gerner

customer_reviews.title: Well made and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This bar neck pad is exactly what I was looking for. I mix up workouts, so when I am doing barbell complexes the pad stays in place when switching from overhead press to back squat. I had initially purchased one of the many popular pads that required no straps or Velcro. The problem was these could pop off in middle of a workout. The Velcro closure on the Dark Iron Fitness pad keeps the pad exactly where it is needed, the product has a nice fit and finish and is comfortable. This provides me the ability to focus on the form and the lift and not the possibility of malfunction. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Branicky

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, sturdy, easy to put on and remove, comfy add sweat doesnt soak in, nothing negative really.
customer_reviews.author: V Huskey

customer_reviews.title: Saved my shoulders and shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I love going to the gym, but I always dread leg day... all because of my fear of squatting. Not the exercise itself... but the damage the barbell does to my shoulder and shirts. Needless to say, this item has been a great part of my gym regimen over the past week. It makes squatting so much more comfortable and I do not know why I never spent the measly $10-$20 investing in this product. This is a huge investment if you want to save your shoulders/neck from needless pain as well as spare you gym shirts! Highly recommend this item since it has such a great practical use and feels durable as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Solid Barbell Neck Pad at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this barbell neck pad mainly for hip thrusts and it's perfect. I hated having to hunt one down at the gym or having to use a shredded foam pad, so it just made sense to buy my own. I currently use the Dark Iron Fitness dip belt, so it was a no brainier to buy their barbell pad and I am extremely happy with my purchase. The price was great as well. It's also backed by their lifetime warranty, so I'll never need to worry it the pad somehow falls apart. My girlfriend uses the pad for squats and she loves it. I highly recommend this Barbell Neck Pad and any product from Dark Iron Fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Comfortable, I only got up to about 245lb squats so I can't say how comfortable this is after that but definitely way better than just the bar on your neck. I do high volume squats at around 200lbs and I'm usually about to tear up around 15 reps bar only (the pain!), with this thing on I could do 20 reps and not be in a rush to get it off my back, just as relaxed as I got it on. No more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: wonderful value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this I wish I would've bought one sooner it saves me from getting horrible bruises on my pelvic/hip area from hip thrust and from getting sore/bruised traps from back squat. 10/10 recommend. It is a great product! My only complaint is that it isn't as thick as I would like it to be, but it is 10x better than the ones at my gym. For the price it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Dark Iron Fitness made it again
customer_reviews.text: Dark Iron Fitness made it again. I bought I belt 6 months ago and it has been with me during every leg and back training. I needed a barbell neck pad because the gym ones were always being used or falling apart in pieces, so now I bring my own and my workouts have been happiest than ever since then. The pad is really good quality and the velcro does not fall off when exercising. Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder saver for leg day!
customer_reviews.text: For years I had been wrapping my gym towel around my barbell for leg day. The next day I wouldn't only be sore in the legs, but also on my shoulders where the bar rested. This foam neck pad has been a lifesaver! It fits snuggly on my barbell and is very comfortable on my shoulders. It makes leg day something to look forward to now instead of always being tempted to skip. I'd recommend this product to anyone that is looking for something to ease shoulder/back pain while squatting.
customer_reviews.author: The Vroom's

customer_reviews.title: 2nd dark iron piece, luv it, great quality
customer_reviews.text: 2nd dark iron piece, luv it, great quality Like the leather over nylon pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount and adjust, does the job very well. So far very durable. The padding is more than adequate for olympic bar squats, etc. This is designed very well, they didn't overthink things, just made a quality product that works.
customer_reviews.author: bigbear

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I have always found squatting with heavy weight uncomfortable. This pad has changed that! I throw it in my gym bag on leg days and have no troubles now. If you feel you need a bar pad this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe-O

customer_reviews.title: Small logo, but pretty nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for me, but hubby says it's a little hard to him. Thought the logo would be bigger, but turns out it's very small. Overall, seems to be good quality. Velcro allows easy on/off the bar. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Provides firm padding and is holding up great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Will Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Best thing Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best things ive bought from Amazon to continue my goals in the gym!! I love this neck pad & im like why didnt i know about it sooner? Its the best thing because when ever i would use the barbell, it will hurt my neck & shoulders, but with this cushion, its Super Amazing cause i can lift heavier & my nech or shoulders have not been sore ever since ive used it!! I highly recommend!!! Im a female & we can some times be a little fragile, soo i do recommend 100% to every one. Thnx for this Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.  Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric (if you want to call it that) was so hard. I thin the pad itself would cause issues because it's so hard. You aren't even able to bend it. So how is it supposed to curve to my upper back? I returned it and bought one made of a softer fabric even though it cost more money. Plus the fact all of them come with designs on them is annoying. People don't want obnoxious sayings on them.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKat13825

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: The barbell pad is thick, comfy and is a good support for your neck and shoulders. It isn't just foam, so you won't get any tears or rips and the smooth surface will be easy to wipe clean and quick to dry. Overall, a great purchase that helps performance when squatting, paired with great customer service from the company and a decent price point when taking into account the longevity the product will have, as well as the warranty the seller provides. I suggest picking one up if you're tired or squatting with a naked bar and want a little more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian King

customer_reviews.title: Gets it done
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont use these pads, as theyre typically frowned upon by most body builders. However, I started switching up some lifts and used it to go over my hips for seated thrusts. Ive also let a few friends who are just starting out and not used to the bar try it as well. I ended up donating this to the gym at work and everyone thats used it seems to really appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my 30 year old Altrus leather wrapped pad from my teens
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra width. The padding is the correct balance of comfort and stability. I was worried that the vinyl might be slippery but that was not the case. I'm very happy with the pad. I'm 53 and doing over 6 tons in 30 reps with the new pad.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars all around
customer_reviews.text: Overall sufficient product. Definitely would not label this pad as "extra thick." I use this pad for hip thrusters. Pad has started to form around where bar is normally placed, but it's sufficiently comfortable across my hips. Unsure if I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Leland White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I was having issues with the bar rubbing my skin raw with heavier weight. This saved the day. They have a loyal customer now. All my workout equipment needs will be from them!
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very comfortable, cute design :)
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am blown away by the quality of this barbell pad I can hardly wait to use it at the gym tomorrow for a more productive workout and minimal neck soreness . I love the design, it is very cute and the padding isn’t hard/stiff/uncomfortable. It’s also a great length so it will fit across the back of my neck and on my hips perfectly. The customer service has been amazing as well, following up with me when my order shipped and after I let them know it had been delivered. Great company & of course great product. I also purchased the ankle straps :)
customer_reviews.author: *Joi2urWorld*

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on to my Olympic barbell in my home gym to be able to squat without any discomfort in my upper back/shoulders. This product exceeded my expectations and makes working out with it excellent.
customer_reviews.author: danny b

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few weeks back and we all love it. We have a home gym, that the whole family uses. Works very well for squats when the bar starts digging more with weight. My daughter, 16, won't squat without them anymore, she loves it! Her brothers could care less, but my old shoulders and neck really appreciate the comfort again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Easy to put on and take off. Velcro works well too. It does slip side to side when installed on an Olympic Barbell but once the load is on it remains stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable fits snug on the Olympic bar. Doesn’t spin around like others. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. On a standard bar if you're not paying ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. On a standard bar if you're not paying attention it will slide to either side depending on your movements when un-racking & you can't alter this once you've begun your set. But you will pick up on this quickly. The other thing with a standard bar is to keep the seam directly on your shoulders, saw once where the velcro had began opening on one side after finishing a set.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Its a neck pad that does what it's supposed to do. It eases some of the pressure on your traps where the BB would rest. Velcro holds to the bar well and is comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd product I have purchased from this company and, once again, they came through with a high quality product at a reasonable price. The barbell neck cushion arrived quickly, and I tried it out the next day. What a difference from my not using any cushioning or just using my sweat towel! Great fit on the bar and on my neck, and easy to put on and remove. Another winner from Dark Iron Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg MB

customer_reviews.title: Love thos bar pad.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar pad. Very comfertable, at first I was worried about it being like memory foam but its not, muh thicker and I do t see it breaking down. The pad made it very easy to do squats and even added extra weight with out fear of hurting my neck. My husband even used it and liked how comfortable it was and he used double the weight k do.The only complaint that I have it that after I was done with my work out there was a few threads that's came undone from the vaclcro but its nothing I can't fix. Over all extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I decide to invest in a home gym that included a squat rack with Olympic bar and weights. We’re out there almost daily! I ordered the dark iron barbell pad because my main exercises include weighted squats, lunges, and hip thrusts, which just can’t be done comfortably without some serious padding. We’ve had the pad for 3 months now, and not only has it protected my shoulders, neck, and hips from bruising, but it hasn’t lost any of its original shape despite almost daily use!! I, of course, chose the “shut up and squat” design, which I freakin love. So glad we invested in one. Worth it. I know it’ll last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jahara

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a bar cushion, but my clients do, and they have liked this one a lot. It fits more snuggly on the bar than some I've had, and the velcro closure is grippy. As a result, the pad mostly stays where positioned (rather than spinning to where the closure winds up under the bar, letting it slip back directly onto your shoulders and eliminating any value). It's different from most other pads I've had over the years, as it has a vinyl (I assume) cover rather than a fabric one. I don't like the feeling of that as much, but it's easier to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: janetm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pad
customer_reviews.text: Pad has heavy duty padding with a sturdier covering than most others that I’ve used. Also feels a little more thick and dense than most other pads. Works well for squats but you have to adjust to the thicker feel. It’s great if you have spinal disc issues in upper back/neck area. Works especially well for hip thrusts.
customer_reviews.author: Rhc

customer_reviews.title: Another great Dark Iron Fitness product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great barbell pad. I bought it to replace my old Barbinger pad. It is much thicker and made of a better quality material and, most importantly, more comfortable. Also, the lifetime warranty that comes with all dark iron fitness products is great! Will definitely continue to buy from them!
customer_reviews.author: Smanore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but almost didn’t fit bar
customer_reviews.text: This helped with my squats and hip thrusters a lot. The only thing I didn’t like is the Velcro almost wouldn’t fasten around the bar and they are standard sized. Maybe as it gets broken in it will loosen up. It also slips a little when squatting but overall the comfort is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take back & forth to the gym and really wanted something that was convenient to bring with me. It is well made and does its job. The material is easy to wipe down and the pad is perfectly sized. My husband now uses it too and is also happy with it, so it works for both a petite female and a large male.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Fits Olympic Bar perfectly-no slippage, velcro closure fits exactly so that velcro strip does not contact the skin, foam is totally enclosed by the covering, cover can be wiped clean and will not absorb sweat, foam just the right density so that your back does not feel the bar and finally-- great price. Dislikes: none
customer_reviews.author: swan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bar Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality pad for my bars. I have a small tight gym so I have a variety of shorter bars, Olympic size and speciality so this Velcro is perfect for sizing to any of them. The seal is strong and tight. The padding is perfect for hip thrusts over my hip bones, the best so far of any I’ve used. The price is very reasonable because this is a good value added to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: YooperGirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT 17", it's 15"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it claimed to be wider than most pads... it's not. Maybe somebody at Dark Iron Fitness should buy a ruler. If you want a 17" wide barbell pad, this one is most definitely not the one you want. It's going right back.
customer_reviews.author: Snappy

customer_reviews.title: Great style and quality, a must!
customer_reviews.text: A barbell pad improves the liftong experiencw signficantly, for me it is actually a must, otherwise it would hurt me for days. This specific pad is very high quality and I love that they have different sytles. It's amazing they offer lifetime warranty for the price but by the quality it has I can expect is because it will never be needed. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Silva

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on a Saturday, delivered on the Sunday. Covered by a lifetime warranty for a product under $20!. Design is terrific, so no-one should have any trouble fitting it securely onto their bar in a moment. I tested it last night, under the eye of my trainer, and it did not interfere with my form at all AND it did the trick, leaving me with zero neck discomfort the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Craig McMurtry

customer_reviews.title: NOT 17” LONG
customer_reviews.text: Product not as advertised. Clearly states this is 17” long which is the reason I purchased it. Measures exactly 15”. I will keep it because its a hassle to return but I won’t buy anymore products from this company. If you advertise it to be be 17” then make it 17”. Wow
customer_reviews.author: cliff m

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have a couple other products from Dark Iron, was looking for one of these so chose to order theirs. Great product, comfortable and well made, thicker than others I've used. Would be even better if it had a little grip on the inside so it slid on the bar less, but once it's loaded up it doesn't move, so doesn't affect performance.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight lifting pad.
customer_reviews.text: Really like my new neck pad. It's well made of a leather material and the velcro part is wide enough to accommodate many bars. I'd buy it again. I like it better than the foam kind it seems much much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: floflo

customer_reviews.title: Gotta try this brand, great quality products
customer_reviews.text: This offers great support. I use it in conjunction with the weight belt and strap and it all works great together. I bought this to replace a different brand of support and I'm so glad I made the switch. It has just the right amount of cushion and is made of quality material, I will not be going back to my old brand. I look forward to what Dark Iron comes out with next.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna May

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month. It really has made the heavy squats more bearable. I had found that without it the bar was tearing up the skin. Wrapping a towel around the bar helped a little bit, but this is perfect. Easy to put on...easy to take off. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RSG

customer_reviews.title: A great product for serious fitness
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw another gym member with this special version and she wanted it! Since she goes to the gym 6 days a week without fail, I found it for her. After a short time using is, she LOVES it and will discard her old one from her gym bag !!! Thank you for this high quality product, I know others will appreciate it as well !!! Great design and function !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is glorious. I tried everything from a pool ...
customer_reviews.text: This is glorious. I tried everything from a pool noodle to a towel to a folded up yoga mat to protect my hips while doing hip thrusters. I was so excited to receive this, that when I did (at 830p), I went out to my garage to workout. Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: telford3

customer_reviews.title: Support for Neck/Shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Padded barbell equipment does the job protecting neck and shoulders while doing knee bends. Seller offers lifetime replacement if you register this product. That was the selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: LaBelle  Coeur

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I bought this not because I'm so ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought this not because I'm so swole that I lift crazy heavy weights that dig into my vertebrate, but because my squat rack is a teeeeeeny bit wobbly, and when I set the bar down after a set, the bar vibrates a little and it feels uncomfortable/teeny bit dangerous against my spine. So this neck pad fixes that issue entirely. I can't feel any vibration whatsoever. It also is now super comfortable to squat! I used to think I enjoyed the feeling of the bar against my back, but this is better. And I just leave it on for other lifts (bench press, deadlift, OH press, ... ). It doesn't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which allows me to perfect my form
customer_reviews.text: I have been squatting without a pad for roughly a year, and it has gotten more difficult as I’ve increased my weights. I bought this with limited expectations as it was the cheapest one I could find, and I couldn’t be more impressed! It is very high quality, fits a 2” bar perfectly, and completely changed my squat game! It gives me so much support, which allows me to perfect my form, and allows for a deeper, more effective squat. The customer service from this company is phenomenal, and I will go to them for any items I may need in the future. I can’t say enough good things about this product!
customer_reviews.author: EmBall

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable around my shoulders, not a hard material at all. Attached to my Olympic bar very easily and the Velcro closure, all though not needed in my opinion, is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and still inflated
customer_reviews.text: I purposely waited sometime (4 months) before writing a review to ensure that the product didn't compress after being used. It's used frequently and still maintaining its posture well. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: What a huge let down. Was so looking forward to using this product when squatting but it has not give whatsoever and make it more painful and uncomfortable. The thing is so hard on my neck and shoulders. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: msruecee

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you lift regularly
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability of this bar pad. It has velcro along the entire length of the pad, which helps hold it in place. It does make squats with the barbell less uncomfortable across my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Jasnmil mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Item
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made barbell neck pad. This neck pad fits my Stainless Steel Rogue Ohio Bar securely and when in use it does not shift or rotate like other neck pads. The pad is very comfortable and stable on the neck.I became interested because all of the amazing reviews and I thought it must be a great product if the reviews have such high ratings. I am very pleased with this item and I love supporting "smaller" businesses especially when they bring a well made product, professionalism and provide a personal aspect to the entire experience. THANK YOU DARK IRON FITNESS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good pad
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Feels well made. Too early to tell on durability but so far so good. I can do squats down without hurting my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great pad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the cost. Quality feels good, I like the softer velcro, but the pad it self isn’t as snug as I though but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rpendo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Barbell and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I own several of Dark Iron Fitness's products, and they all share a common theme - great products for a reasonable price. I highly suggest checking out this neck pad and other products. My favorite is still their leather lifting straps! Customer service is excellent if you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for anyone that hates using the communal pads.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this pad because of it's high rating and when I used it the first time I realized why it's popular. This thing is so densely padded yet not chunky, that it's almost luxurious to use (as dumb as that sounds). Seriously though, if you're looking for a good pad for yourself, you won't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The padding seems made to last. Tight seems,and durable material. Placement on the Olympic 2" bar was great with no gaps. As one person noted the material is a bit slippery,but you can see that in the pics. Neither myself or my teenage son have problems doing squats with this padding on. Definetly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kaydee

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to work out with, and I love the texture because I know it will last me for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Isama borges

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: Great product, appears to be more durable than the pad I was using in the past. Definitely thicker and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Padding not enough
customer_reviews.text: The padding is not enough. I wrapped it around the Olympic size bar in the gym. As I squatted, I could feel the metal and I am not supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: ceejay

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is good and it seems to be a great pad for ...
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is good and it seems to be a great pad for the price. Definitely recommended! So glad I came across this pad. The Dark Iron barbell pad will not come off during use. It has a sturdy Velcro strap along the entire length of the pad. It fits tightly around the bar and has plenty of padding for a comfortable lift it's about an inch thick.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Martin-Koester

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but loose
customer_reviews.text: The pad is comfortable, but I find myself trying to hold it in place as it slides down one side of the bar and turns around too much. If the pad could be tightened up, it would solve the moving problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barhuma Al

customer_reviews.title: Good value, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I use these for hip thrusts. The padding is adequate and far superior to double folding one of those workout mats to cushion the bar. Overall I'm happy with the purchase and I trust Dark Iron that the velcro and padding won't deteriorate over multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Reviewer recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Item arrived in pristine condition, and not to mention, it's functional AND super cute. I was looking for a barbell neck pad for my home gym, and this one got the best reviews. I'm definitely not disappointed! Looking forward to getting plenty of use out of this neck pad while doing squats :)
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cheap enough and works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could do glute bridges with a heavy barbell. It fulfilled its function.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I hit that Smith machine like a boss lol. This pad is so comfortable. It's extra thick and provides a great amount of cushion and protection for your neck and shoulders. It certainly makes me want to do more reps because I'm not worried about hurting my shoulders. Great for beginners who haven't had much experience with squats and lunges on the Smith machine or just with a regular barbell. I just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lomax

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time the other day and it is so much better than the crappy one the gym had to offer. Really happy with this purchase. I’ll have to see how long it holds up for but for $10 it was a good deal! Makes squats so much better on your back/shoulders. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hip thrusts
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can do heavy hip thrusts pain free!!! This pad is great, not excessively thick, and provides the perfect amount of cushion. I can focus on the burn in my muscles now, instead of the weight of the bar digging into my pelvis! It got here very quickly as well. Very nice product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndseynd

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: came right on time and better than expected. I was really thinking for such a good price it couldn't be that good, but it really was. Great padding and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Fits and cushions well and stays put
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put on a bar at my local gym as all their supplied pads were thin and worn out. It does what it is supposed to do without muss or fuss and is a big help in allowing you to concentrate on the muscles you're trying to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar Pad!!
customer_reviews.text: So far pretty dang good!! No more of those sweaty bar pads everyone uses at the gym. We use only ours and bring it home with us. We’ve been extremely pleased!!! Thank you Dark Iron
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kay

product_meta.title: Dark Iron Fitness 17 Inch Extra Thick Barbell Neck Pad - Shoulder Support for Weight Lifting Crossfit Powerlifting and More - Fits 2 Inch Olympic Size Bars and a Smith Machine Bar Perfectly
feature_bullets: WORK OUT MORE COMFORTABLY: Cushions neck, shoulders & thighs against the heavy bar during squats, lunges & hip thrusts. Designed to fit 2" Olympic size bars perfectly
WON'T FLATTEN OUT: Our design features top-grade, 3/4" dense foam to provide optimal support and comfort during your WOD or powerlifting training. Retains its shape; won't flatten easily.
STAND OUT FROM THE CROWD: Choose one of several custom designs with motivational slogans. A refreshing twist on boring, generic-looking barbell pads! Sleek black background color
WON'T ABSORB MOISTURE: Durable synthetic leather material won't absorb perspiration. Moisture remains on the surface and can be easily wiped away. Won't accumulate odors over time
HIGH QUALITY: We're so confident in the quality of our barbell pad, we'll send you a brand new barbell wrap at no cost to you if yours ever fails "
